summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The City of Dallas is holding a special called meeting on March 25, 2025, at 11:30 A.M. at the Oak Cliff Municipal Center. The purpose of the meeting is to review and approve minutes from a previous meeting and to discuss proposed amendments to the Dallas City Code.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Call to Order.
2. Review and Approval of Minutes from the March 5, 2024, Special Called Meeting.
3. Discussion and recommendations on amendments to Chapters 52, 53, and 57 of the Dallas City Code, specifically changing the name of Chapter 57 from the Dallas One- and Two-Family Dwelling Code to the Dallas One- to Eight-Family Dwelling Code.
4. Adjournment.

**Important Details**:  
The proposed amendments aim to update administrative procedures and building codes to reflect current standards and practices. The renaming of Chapter 57 is significant as it expands the scope of the code to include up to eight-family dwellings, potentially impacting housing regulations and development in the city.

**Action Items**:  
The meeting seeks approval of the minutes from the previous meeting and recommendations for the proposed amendments to the Dallas City Code. Participants wishing to speak must register in advance, ensuring an organized discussion on the agenda items.
